item.title: Vance's blast at Europe ignores Ukraine and defence agenda
item.description: Instead, US Vice President JD Vance shocked delegates by roundly attacking Washington's allies, accusing them of censorship.

item.title: 'My wife fears sex, I fear death' - impacts of the USAID freeze
item.description: Despite a US waiver allowing the resumption of humanitarian help, life-saving services have shut.

item.title: What it means when Elon Musk brings his children to work
item.description: You'll sometimes see one of his children on his shoulders as billionaire Elon Musk makes public appearances.

item.title: Accuser drops rape lawsuit against Jay-Z and Sean Combs
item.description: An anonymous accuser who alleged the two rappers had assaulted her when she was 13 has withdrawn her civil claim.

item.title: India anger as judge frees man accused of raping wife who then died
item.description: The controversial ruling once again shines a spotlight on the issue of marital rape in India, which refuses to criminalise it.
